    • Uses of Mesh in jot.math.geometry

      Subclasses of Mesh in jot.math.geometry 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MorphingMesh
      Class that represents a 3D geometry that can morph over time.
      class  PolygonMesh
      Class that represents a 3D geometry, i.e., it contains vertices, normals, and textureCoords values, and the ordered indexes information required to render them.
      class  SkinnedMesh
      Class that represents a 3D geometry that can be animated using a skeleton.
